entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Wawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:25 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -13.0°C
Pressure: 99.6 kPa
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -15.2°C
Wind: NE 20 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
